name: hey-wapuu
description: Natural language search for the WordPress Command Palette.

scripts.start: concurrently "wp-scripts start --config webpack.config.cjs" "chokidar 'src/commands.js' -c 'npm run generate-embeddings'" "chokidar 'build/**/*' 'hey-wapuu.php' 'src/style.css' -c 'npm run package'"
scripts.build: wp-scripts build --config webpack.config.cjs && npm run generate-embeddings && npm run package
scripts.package: rm -f hey-wapuu.zip && mkdir -p dist/hey-wapuu && cp hey-wapuu.php readme.txt dist/hey-wapuu/ && cp -r build dist/hey-wapuu/ && cp -r languages dist/hey-wapuu/ && cp -r models dist/hey-wapuu/ && cd dist && zip -rq ../hey-wapuu.zip hey-wapuu && cd .. && rm -rf dist

author: Regionally Famous
